programmes.show_description: Shook To The Core. An earthquake causes paranormal activity that leaves Gillian too afraid to sleep in her own bedroom. The team work to unearth the entities behind the hauntings. S4, Ep4
Nightmare In Neath. Renovation work has stirred up terrifying paranormal activity in Sarah's Victorian terrace in Neath, Wales. What will the team uncover during their investigation? S4, Ep5
Teleshopping.
Drew and Tee are on an incredible tour of France. In Normandy, Drew falls in love with a grand chateau and at a massive antique fair he immerses himself in pop culture. S14, Ep1
Drew and Tee are on a tour of the Midlands. In Walsall, they have a money-spinning idea, in Birmingham Drew finds treasure and they explore a grand country house. S14, Ep2
A couple of high-flyers search for a home by the water in Anglesey and Llandudno, North Wales. They want a 4-bedroom property for a budget of around £750,000. S2, Ep8

In the Cotswolds, Drew is given exclusive access to a dozen shipping containers. Drew picks out three items, including a 19th century glazed bookcase. S17, Ep15
Drew finds a mysterious piece of black pottery in Lancashire, finds an exotic piece in a zoo in East Anglia and fiercely haggles with an old foe in a nearby salvage yard. S10, Ep1
Chocks Away! Angus helps a widow in Lincoln find new homes for her late husband's aviation paintings. Plus, he finds a ring with some serious bling in Essex. S6, Ep1
Jugtastic! Angus visits a home with a pub in it, filled with over 160 jugs. Later, he encounters a colossal collection of Glen Millar Vinyl and V-discs! S6, Ep2
Desperately Needing Angus. Angus helps a woman fund her elderly mum's care, and he clears a home for a couple who went through a life-changing, traumatic event on holiday. S6, Ep3
Irita and Mark set out on their first trip together, hunting for antiques to sell at auction. But when the hammer goes down, who will come out on top? S26, Ep11
Experts Irita and Mark continue their search for money making treasures. Some anatomy moulds and a 200-year-old ornament go under the gavel. S26, Ep12
Irita and Mark visit East Anglia on a search for treasures from a bygone era including a rare blue duck and sought-after Hungarian porcelain. S26, Ep13
Irita and Mark go treasure hunting in The Fens. They find an antique that hides a secret and another that could be the series' most gruesome ever buy. S26, Ep14
It's Mark and Irita's last chance to buy profit-making collectables. Will a shoe shaped pin cushion or a 1970s motorbike sell for the most at auction? S26, Ep15
EJ Osborne asks carpenter Ollie Allen to repurpose an old wooden door. And, lighting expert Guy Trench gets creative with a collection of wine bottles. S7, Ep2
Upholsterer Leigh-Anne Treadwell transforms an old ottoman. Bagmaker Neil Wragg repurposes a windbreaker, and designer Sarah Moore works on a pram. S7, Ep3

Drums And Demo, John Stamos. John Stamos steps in with Jonathan and Drew to transform his best friend's garage into the ultimate hangout and jam room. S6, Ep9

Law And Disorder. In Bristol, Emma noticed the handprints of a former policeman appearing all over her home. However, he's been dead almost 20 years, so why is he still there? S4, Ep7
